From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

OOC: You know the Decepticons can fly in robot mode. 

BIC:

Hook still clenched his shoulder, it must be inactive now, he thought to
himself. He looked back up, at the aliens, "You have to talk to my l..."
he was cut off by Havotron exiting. He smiled to himself. "Raisle was
it? Meet....Havotron." Hook declared gloriosly.

Apeface heard the order from behind the aliens, and grunted, "Sure, me
always get exciting jobs." He said sarcastically, as he began to swagger
towards the ship, ignoring everything that was happening.

_____________________________________________________________________

Nightmare nodded, then saluted to his leader, as he took off, as he
walked towards the bridge. Jagged was all to curious of his new mode
however, and was busy sharpening his claws against each other, as they
made a violent noise, of rasor sharp metal on metal.
______________________________________________________________________
Megatron snarled at the screen shutting down. This pretender to the
thrown, may become a nuissance. This however, was no problem, it just
pushed the schedule ahead. He moved towards the speaker system.
"Decepticons, we are going to abandon our position, Perceptor, quickly
pack up the laser turrets from outside, Bodicons, come to the bridge. He
then headed down towards the engine room.
